name: Foot Clinic - ASMR Feet Care
description:
Hey doctor, ready for foot surgery? Welcome to Foot Clinic, the #1 ASMR simulation game. Scrub, scrape, pluck, and pull all kinds of feet in this ASMR foot clinic doctor care game. Do surgery on calluses, corns, ingrown toenails, and more. This ASMR simulator will take your doctor skills to the next level. Ready for surgery?

"To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit our Privacy Policy: https://crazylabs.com/app"
